## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
mpg %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = displ, y = hwy, color = drv)) + 
  geom_jitter() + scale_color_viridis_d() 
  # theme_minimal()
```
